name: A short rest (Ernesto Torres)
description:
A small game where you decide how the heroes rest and recover from daily adventures. The better rested they are, the faster they will be able to reach the town.

The Skeleton King is invading

Our brave heroes are on the way

But it's a long journey...

Help them recover from daily adventures

A game by Ernesto Torres (@ernesto_io)

Inspired by famicase "Short rest"  by Daniel Gil (@ChubsyUnicorn)

Music by @doctordreamchip

Built for: A Game By Its Cover 2021
